name: Tree Blight
languages: understands Common and Druidic but doesn't speak

traits.name: False Appearance
entries: While the blight remains motionless, it is indistinguishable from a dead tree.

traits.name: Siege Monster
entries: The blight deals double damage to objects and structures.

actions.name: Multiattack
entries: The blight makes one Branch attack and one Grasping Root attack.

actions.name: Branch
entries: Melee atk +9 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. 16 (3d6 + 6 damage) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Grasping Root
entries: Melee atk +9 to hit, reach 15 ft., one creature not {@condition grappled} by the blight. The target is {@condition grappled} (escape DC 15). Until the grapple ends, the target takes 9 (1d6 + 6 damage) bludgeoning damage at the start of each of its turns. The root has AC 15 and can be severed by dealing 6 slashing damage or more to it at once. Cutting the root doesn't hurt the blight, but ends the grapple.
